properties.description: Open from 06-01-2023. All are welcome. A warm space for anyone who is looking for a space to be warm and enjoy some company. We serve the villages of Lamerton, Milton Abbot, Chillaton, Marystowe, Coryton and Sydenham Damerel, but welcome anybody from the surrounding area.
